title: Creamy roasted butternut squash soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 butternut squash, halved lengthwise and seeded', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon butter, or to taste', '1 onion, finely diced', '2 cloves garlic, pressed', '75g grated carrot, or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon dried marjoram, or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon celery seed, or to taste', '2 pinches cayenne pepper, or to taste', '1L chicken stock', '4 tablespoons double cream, or more to taste', '50g cream cheese, or more to taste']
